topic.title: Controller Nodes
topic.shortdesc: The controller nodes have two bonded interfaces, one with two vLANs configured, and two remaining interfaces that are not bonded.

body.p: The Public API network is on a pair of bonded interfaces, and the Private API and Storage networks are on a separate pair of bonded interfaces.
The Private API and Storage networks are vLAN tagged networks on a bonded interface. The Provisioning and Management interfaces are on individual, non-bonded interfaces.
